name: Slack
description: Slack service for team communication and messaging

slack.new_message.name: New Message in Channel
slack.new_message.description: Triggers when a new message is posted in a specific channel

channel.label: Channel Name or ID (optional, leave empty for all channels)

slack.new_dm.name: New Direct Message
slack.new_dm.description: Triggers when the user receives a new private message

slack.channel_created.name: Channel Created
slack.channel_created.description: Triggers when a new channel is created in the workspace

creator.label: Creator User ID (optional, leave empty for all channel creations)

slack.reaction_added.name: Reaction Added to Message
slack.reaction_added.description: Triggers when someone adds a reaction (emoji) to a message

channel.label: Channel Name or ID (optional, leave empty for all channels)

emoji.label: Emoji Name (optional, leave empty for any reaction)

slack.send_message.name: Send Message to Channel
slack.send_message.description: Send a custom message to a specific Slack channel

slack.add_reaction.name: Add Reaction to Last Message
slack.add_reaction.description: Add an emoji reaction to the last message in a channel

slack.send_dm.name: Send Direct Message
slack.send_dm.description: Send a private direct message to a Slack user

slack.pin_message.name: Pin Last Message
slack.pin_message.description: Pin the last message in a Slack channel
